
                            
                            <div class="xdg"><p>望潮的之前发过，这3个都有水<br>1.阅读有礼（阅读12篇抽）<br>2.放烟花（发送一条祝福抽）<br>3.春节宠粉（答题1道抽，中奖几率手动提）<br><br><br>3个活动我得0.16+0.33+0.88=1.37元<br>1、2到支F宝，3到账微信<img src="https://pic.xiaodigu.cn/pic/20250201/1738386383293465_689.jpg"></p><hr><img src="https://pic.xiaodigu.cn/pic/20250201/1738386383296418_853.jpg"><hr><img src="https://pic.xiaodigu.cn/pic/20250201/1738386432149262_628.jpg"><hr><img src="https://pic.xiaodigu.cn/pic/20250201/1738386432217497_633.jpg"><p></p></div>
